docs.lead_paragraph: Scientists may have the first evidence that Zika can cause temporary paralysis, according to a new study of patients who developed the rare condition during an outbreak of the virus in Tahiti two years ago.

headline.main: Study: 1st Evidence That Zika May Cause Temporary Paralysis
headline.print_headline: Study: 1st Evidence That Zika May Cause Temporary Paralysis

docs.snippet: Scientists may have the first evidence that Zika can cause temporary paralysis, according to a new study of patients who developed the rare condition during an outbreak of the virus in Tahiti two years ago.

headline.main: Turning Your Pet Into a Therapy Dog
headline.print_headline: Turning Your Pet Into a Therapist

docs.abstract: Jane Brody signed up her dog, Max, to be a therapy dog and discovered that patients, hospital workers and pet owners all reap the benefits of the experience.
docs.snippet: Jane Brody signed up her dog, Max, to be a therapy dog and discovered that patients, hospital workers and pet owners all reap the benefits of the experience.
